content: the peaceful easy blanket is a joy to make relaxing peaceful easy no worries no fancy stitches- let the color do all of the work for you perfect as a first crochet blanket for a beginner for a fast project for a gift or as a project you can work on while you watch tv without having to think too much this is a beginner pattern pattern is written in us terms and includes explanations of all stitches and abbreviations us and metric measurements given finished dimensions are about 45 by 68 inches 115 by 173 cm when using medium worsted weight yarn and a 6 mm hook it s a great size for a twin bed or for relaxing on the couch it is shown here on a full double size bed this pattern can also be used to make a beautiful rug or towel pattern pdf includes detailed color photos of techniques for beginners yardage requirements for each color as well as for the whole blanket yarn recommendations including color descriptions and a recommended brand options for a full double size blanket with yardage requirements options for a baby blanket size with yardage requirements options for using fewer colors with yardage requirements links to video tutorials for beginners and left-handed crocheters please feel free to sell your finished items made with this pattern as long as you credit pretty peaceful for the pattern design and include a link to https //www etsy com/shop/prettypeaceful on the item whether you sell online or locally thank you for not distributing this pattern or using the photos within it as your own
